followUpOptions.responseText: Got picked up by some bastards out west. Traded me in for a handful of caps. That was... weeks ago, maybe.

followUpOptions.optionText: You need help getting out of here?
followUpOptions.responseText: You think anyone walks out of here? I wouldn't even know where to go.

options.responseText: Who the fuck—? Oh... another asshole come to play. Fucking kill me or fuck off, I don't care anymore.

followUpOptions.responseText: Broken? I'm fucking pulverized, asshole. You wanna piece? Go ahead, see if there's anything left.
Couple caps, a dose of Jet, a bullet in my skull. Take your pick.

followUpOptions.optionText: Mind your tongue or I'll rip it out.
followUpOptions.responseText: *She spits blood-stained saliva at your feet* Do it, pussy. You'll just get me excited.

options.optionText: What's her story? *point to the girl on the floor.*
options.responseText: Fresh meat. Raiders dragged her in screaming yesterday. Still crying. Give it a week, she'll beg you to put her down.
I'm their favorite toy—used, abused, broken. Only thing keeping me breathing is spite. And I have plenty left for you if you get too close.

auto_lines: They said I was lucky. Said the last girl didn’t even last a day.
He said if I cry again, he’ll cut my ears off.
*wet coughing in the next room... followed by low, guttural sobbing*
